title: Repeals certain provisions of the election law and adds new section permitting a voter to vote by special ballot at the board of elections upon written statement and
summary: Repeals certain provisions of the election law and adds a new section to such law permitting a voter to vote by special ballot at the board of elections upon submission of a written statement and verification of specific qualifications of such voter.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to early voting; and to repeal sections 11-300, 11-302, and 11-306 of such law relating thereto
